repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: A composite codex made of 3 different booklets and 3 isolated single folios, which belonged to Abraham-Hyacinthe Anquetil-Duperron (1731-1805). It contains Christian prayers, ritual texts, and religious principles in Portuguese, Tamil, and Latin languages. Some of the Portuguese texts are translated into Tamil with Portuguese glosses in interlinear position. It also contains Latin calendar, solar timing, and zodiacal signs.

The booklet 1 contains the following items in Portuguese and in Tamil translation:
A forma de fazer a Estaçaõ os Domingos (3 folios = pp. 1-6).
A forma de fazer a Estaçaõ em lingua Tamulica os Domingos (13 folios = pp. 7-31).
A forma de dar a cazar segundo o Ritual portuguez (4 folios = pp. 32-38).
A Mesma forma de fazer casamento em lingua tamulica (4 folios = pp. 39-46).
O Ensino pera aprender a dar o Bautismo quando alguma criança està no perigo de morte, e que naõ Encontraõ se os padres (1 folio = pp. 47-48).
Acto de contriçaõ imperfeito ~ ou ~ atriçaõ (1 folio = pp. 48-51).
Da trindade oraçaõ (10 folios = pp. 51-70). This includes various prayers.
The isolated folio 1 consists in Tamil sentences.
The isolated folio 2 provides on its recto a text of Mark the Evangelist (in latin and Portuguese) for the Sunday following Pentecost and Tamil sentences about the holy calender on the verso.
The booklet 2, A explicaçaõ da doutrina christaã, is an explanation of the Christian doctrine in Poertuguese.
The isolated folio 3 bears an engraving of the Trinity pasted on its recto.

The booklet 3, Ordo Divini Officii recitandi Missae, contains the following items in Latin:
Tabula temporaria 1745 (14 folios = pp. 91-117).
Ordinis Minorum Sancti francisci Capucinorum (1 folio = p. 118).
Casos reservados do Arcepispado de Goa (2 folios = pp. 119-122).
Taboa da observancia do sol em vinte hum graos (4 folios = pp. 123-129).
Tabula quæ docet quomodo horologia rotis artificiosis instructa, ad visum horologiorum solarium reducenda sint (3 folios = pp. 131-135.)
Description by Cristina MURU based on the online digitized version.
Description revised and enlarged by Emmanuel Francis based on the examination of the original manuscript (February 2025).

msItem.title: Booklet 1: Christian prayers and ritual formulae
Booklet 2: A explicaçaõ da doutrina christaã
Booklet 3: Ordo Divini Officii recitandi Missae

support.p: Brownish or yellow paper of different sizes.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark on recto.
2 folios = front guard leaves. No foliation. Shelfmark on f[1]r. 180 x 235 mm. Element of binding.
37 folios = Booklet 1: Christian prayers and ritual formulae. 180 x 235 mm.
2 folios = Booklet 1: guard leaves. No foliation. No pagination. 180 x 235 mm.
35 folios = Booklet 1: Christian prayers and ritual formulae (main text). Library Roman pagination 1-70. 180 x 235 mm.

1 folio = Isolated foli0 1: Tamil sentences. Library Roman pagination 71-[72]. The folio has been inserted in reversed order, therefore the beginning is on the verso and the end is on the recto. 140 x 215 mm.
1 folio = Isolated foli0 2. Library Roman pagination 73-[74]. 160 x 100 mm.
7 folios = Booklet 2: A explicaçaõ da doutrina christaã. Partial original pagination 1-5.1, 5.2, then foliation 9-10 = defective library Roman pagination 75-88. pp. 85-88 blank. 155 x 200 mm.
1 folio = Isolated folio 3 with engraving of Trinity. Pagination 11-12 = library Roman pagination 89-[90]. p. 90 blank. 180 x 235 mm. Engraving = 100 x 150 mm.

26 hinged folios = Booklet 3: Ordo Divini Officii recitandi Missae. Foliation 13-38 = defective library Roman pagination 91-135, [136-142]. pp. [136-141] blank. Signatures and scribblings on p. [142]. 150 x 225 mm.
2 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso. 180 x 235 mm. Element of binding.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. But the front cover is detached.

layoutDesc.layout: The text occupies the full page. Titles may have a bigger size and/or be preceded and followed by a drawing similar to paraph. The number of lines per page is variable.

handNote.desc: Double-looped ṟa. Ambiguous kāl (= medial ā or ra). Long ē and ō are not systematically marked. The Tamil text written by a European hand. Sometimes a diacritic consisting in an horizontal stroke is placed above the consonant to indicate that it is followed by the long vowel. A comma below the line marks the word separation.
A comma below the line marks the word separation.

decoNote.desc: A small drawing like a paraph marks the beginning or the end of a text. Typical of Christian manuscripts, is the cross placed at various places in the margin.

additions.desc: Title on the spine: Prières des Catholique de l'Inde (spine).
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 723 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Ms. Indien 77 (f[2]r).
Description of the contents: Prières, formules du mariage des Chrétiens en portugais et en malabar ou tamul de la côte de Coromandel (f[1]r).
Signature of owner: Anquetil Duperron (f[1]r = p. 1 ).
Stamp: red circle containing an eagle and the writing BIBLIOTHEQUE IMPERIALE (U1b, p. 1, p. 70 + U6, p. 91 and p. 136). This was in use from 1804 to 1815 (n. 18 in Josserand and Bruno 1960: 281).
Emi 1756 (signature [?] and date), P M (initials of a name) Thomas (p. [142])

binding.p: Brown leather decorated cover. Title, decoration, and shelfmark on the spine. Blue marbled guard leaves.

origin.origDate: Various dates found in U6: 23 January 1740 (p. 91), 1745 (p. 91), 1756 (p. [142]). Dated to 1756 by Cabaton (1912: 105).

acquisition.p: Anquetil-Duperron (1731-1805), who had reached Pondicherry in 1755 and had returned to Paris in 1761 (Colas and Colas-Chauhan 1991: 383), transferred 180 oriental manuscripts to the BnF in 1762 (Berthier 2000: 60). His other manuscripts entered the library after his death in 1805 (Colas and Colas-Chauhan 1995: 12).

listBibl.bibl: Anciens catalogues de la Bibliothèque du Roi et de différentes collections qui sont venues l'accroître aux XVIIe, XVIIIe et XIXe siècles. Manuscrits orientaux du fonds Anquelil. Bibliothèque Nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits. NAF 5433, f23r, n° 24.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Paris: E. Leroux, p. 105.

Colas, Gérard and U. Colas-Chauhan. 1991. Five dictionaries in the Telugu manuscript collection of the Bibliothèque nationale, Paris. In Journal of Oriental Research: S.S. Janaki Felicitation Volume. Madras, pp. 379-392.
Colas, Gérard and Colas-Chauhan, U. 1995. Manuscrits telugu. Catalogue raisonné. Paris: Bibliothèque Nationale de France.

Josserand, Pierre and Jean Bruno. 1960. Les estampilles du Département des imprimés de la Bibliothèque nationale. In Mélanges d'histoire du livre et des bibliothèques offerts à Monsieur Frantz Calot. Paris: Librairie d’Argences, pp. 261-298.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Record created by Cristina MURU. Version 1, April 2022.
Revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 2, February 2025.

body.ab:
DOM
A forma de fazer a Estaçaõ os Domingos
pelo final da santa cruz livrai nos, Deos nosso senhor, de nossos inimigos, em nome do padre, e do filho e do espirito sto Amen.
Em nōme do pādre, e do fīlho, e do espirito sānto. Amen. voiez la page 3.
A forma de fazer a Estaçaõ em lingua Tamulica os Domingos.
Aṟciṣṭṭa, ciluvai, Aṭaiyāḷattāl,
Eṅkaḷ, catturukkaḷ, Iṭattil, niṉṟu,
Eṅkaḷai, rakṣittuk koḷḷum,
Eṅkaḷ, caṟuvēsvaraṉē, piṭā
vuṭaiyavum, cutaṉuṭaiyavum, Ispi
rittu, cāntuṭaiyavum, ṉāmattiṉā
le, Āme,n ecu.
Inta, kkaliyāṉaṇattukku, yātoru,
vikkiṉam, Uṇṭāyiruntāl, kuru
cuvāmiyāroṭē, Aṟivikkavum
Aṟiñcavarkaḷ, collātiruntāl,
cāpattukkuḷḷā yi,ruppārkaḷ
A forma de dar a cazar segundo o Ritual portuguez
Os noivos postos de joelhos diante do paroco, ou de quem ouver de dar a cazar, aquelle vestido d'hum sobre peliz com estola de cor azul, lhes ha de fazer huma breve pratica a propostito das obrigaçoens e bens do sacramento de matrimonio:
per actis omnibus, parochus manu suà describatin libro Matrimonium, nomina conjugum et testium.
A Mesma forma de fazer casamento em lingua Tamulica.
Breve exortaçaõ
cuviviceṣattiṉ, vētattiṉuṭaiya, vivāka, taṟmam, nammuṭaiya, ṉātar, Ecu, kkiṟistuviṉāle, karpitta, ṟōmāpuri, Aṟcīṣ·ṭa, capaiyiṉ, Ēḻu, teva, ttiraviyamāyirukkiṟatu
caṟuvēsvaraṉaip pāttu, Eṉakkāka, vēṇṭikkoḷḷuṅ koḷ
O Ensino pera aprender a dar o Bautismo quando alguma criança està no perigo de morte, e que naõ Encontraõ se os padres
tampi, taṅkacci, Uṟṟukēḷuṅkoḷ
ṉāṉ, Uṉṉai, kaḻuvukiṟēṉ, Eṉṉu, colla, vēṇum.
acto de contriçaõ imperfeito ou atriçaõ
Aṭimai, maṉasatāpappaṭuṅkoḷ.
Eṉṉu, nampi, yirukkiṟēṉ.
De trindade oraçaõ
Anti, mantiram
Āṇṭavaruṭaiya, cammaṉacāṉatu, mariyāḷuṭaṉē, vicēśam, colliccu
Āḷavum kaiyi koṇṭu naṭatta
vum ceyayum Āmeṉ cecu.

nī eṉṉa vēlai ceyikiṟāyi
ṉāṉ Oṇṇum ceyya villai cummā yirukkiṟēṉ
vētattukku virōtamāyi naṭakka vēṇṭam
Akkiyāṉikaḷuṭaiya caṭaṅkukaḷai ceyya vēṇṭām
nalla kiṟistu vaṉāyiru tampi cattiyam paṇṇutē
poyi cākṣi collātē
kaḷvāṉātē
poyi collātē
tāyitakappaṉai Aṭiyātē
picāciṉ kōvilukkup pōkātē
periyavarkaḷai pariyācam paṇṇutē
yirukkiṟa Eṅkaḷ
para-maṇṭalaṅkaḷilē

Pour le dimanche après la pentecôte
Misereor super turbam hanc, quià triduo jàm
sustinent me, nec habent quid manducent. Marc. 8.
tenho misericordia d'este, porque ha tres dias que
estaõ me seguindo naõ tendo nada para comer.
Evangelho do S. Marco Capit. 8 :
cevvāyikkiḻamai, Oru canti
putaṉkiḻamai, Aṟciṣṭa, yākko
po, tiruṉāḷ
viyāḻakkiḻamai tēvamātāvi
ṉ-uṭaiya, tāyār, Aṟciṣṭa,
Āṉāḷ, tiruṉāḷ
Ellārum, pūcai, keḻkka-k kaṭaṉ

ab.seg:
1. Somos Christaõs polla graça de deos.
Dizemos polla graça de deos, porque nem por nossos
merecimentos, nem de nossos pays, nem de nossas mays, nem
de outra pura criatura
a penitencia he hum sacramento o qual a nos faz alcançar o perdoaõ dos peccados actuaes cometidos despois do Bautismo.

body.ab:
Ordo Divini Officii recitandi Missae que Celebranda juxtà ritum Breviarii et Missalis romani, ac novam Kalendarii dispositionem, à Sacr. Rit. Congregatione prò Ordine f. s. Minorum S. francisci Capucinorum approbatam 23 januarii 1740.
Cantemus Domino, Gloriose Enim magnificatus est. Exod. 13.
Tabula temporaria
1745
ab urbe Romanâ conditâ ... 2414.
à Creatione Mundi ... 6944.
30 ... De Dom. inf.oct.nativit ... semid ... Com. 4 ... oct ...
31 ... S.Silvestri pap. Conf ... dup ... Com. 4 ... oct ...
omnis spiritus Laudet Dominum.
Amen
Ordinis Minorum Sancti francisci Capucinorum
Cum fratres Bonaventura à ferriâ Minorum Generalis, petrus Maria à Lucâ procurator –
et ità posterum in Universo memorato ordine Servari mandavit. du 23° januarii 1740.
Loco Sigillis.
Fr. patriarcha hierosolomitanus secretario
Casos reservados do Arcepispado de Goa. 16.
I. ... hegregia, e as pessoas que d'ella sabem.
2. ... Levar Christaõs p(er)a terras de infieis p(er) là ficárem ...
id est quasi viginti tribus minutis.
